revised_title: Thermal Conductivity of Incompletely Filled Periodic Arrays of Spheres
tldr: The author investigates the thermal conductivity of composite materials made of periodic arrays of spheres with some lattice sites unoccupied. They develop a method to account for multiparticle interactions and determine the effective conductivity for various ratios of particle diameter to lattice size. The study provides estimates of the effective conductivity for a wide range of parameters, complementing percolation calculations.
